name: RAGE 2: Collector's Edition
summary:
The RAGE 2 Collector’s Edition incluides tons of great bonuses, including the mountable head of Ruckus the Crusher! This loveable half-dead mutant will live on your wall, talking and singing songs. The limited Collector’s Edition also includes: 
 
* An exclusive steel book 
* A Collector’s Edition poster 
 
Bonus Digital Content: 
* Exclusive Bonus Mission -- Cult of the Death God. 
* The DOOM BFG. 
* A Mutant Monster Truck Skin. 
* Wasteland Wizard Cheat Codes. 
* Progress Booster. 
* Nicholas Raine Armor and Settler Pistol. 
* An exclusive Battle Standard to fly from your vehicle.
